Articles.Content: I'm excited to play with my friends when the Multiplayer Update comes out.
I'm curious how new VAB will work in game with multiple crafts created at the same workspace.
Can't wait interstellar travel to be part of the game without plugins.

Очень жду KSP2. Хочу построить огромную колонию на Муне. 

[moderator translation]:

I'm really looking forward to KSP2. I want to build a huge colony on Mun.

Edited February 23, 2023 by Geonovast
translated
I can't wait to fly through the new volumetric clouds!
I'm excited for colonies and long, long, loooooooong missions.
i'm excited for the interstellar parts, i wanna make a giant plane with those parts
I'm very excited for better graphics and performance! Sooner or later

21 hours ago, Dman979 said:



Hey everyone!
To celebrate the release of Kerbal Space Program 2 Early Access, we are having a giveaway: Three copies of Kerbal Space Program 2 are up for grabs to members of this forum!


To enter, simply comment in this thread with something that you're excited for! (Only one entry will be counted per person. The purpose of this thread is as a giveaway and to share what you are excited for; off-topic complaints or comments about KSP2 should be posted in the appropriate forum location.)
Giveaway ends at 6PM PT Thursday! Countdown is here! The prizes will be given to the winners on launch day.
Good luck!

Oh that would be a big help. Remember me fellas? 2011/2012 Sceppie's mini parts? Before tweakscale made my "mod" redundant? Tweakscale was so much better, but I loved that period of time.
I'm just excited to finally revisit my favorite planets with much more surface detail, awesome graphics and more to do and explore!
I'm exited for the changes to planets and UX that should make deep space exploration less painful and more interesting!
The new UI looks very sleek and nice! The graphics look amazing, and so do the colonies. I'm excited for interstellar travel, too!

I'm excited for the new planets and colonisation. I've always enjoyed building rovers and overlanding on the various celestial bodies, new planets and moons look to be great for driving and admiring the scenery.
Wow !  Thanks alot for the giveaway
Hoping to get some nicer ground and sky textures without mods, and hopefully something akin to an autopilot and flight management computer
Excited to finally dip my toes into rocket building!
I am excited for what the modding scene can offer to such an improved game engine!

10 minutes ago, Sceppie said:

Oh that would be a big help. Remember me fellas? 2011/2012 Sceppie's mini parts? Before tweakscale made my "mod" redundant? Tweakscale was so much better, but I loved that period of time.

Wow, someome from the dawn of TweakScale! Pleased to meet you!  (I'm the current TS maintainer)

About KSP2, I'm most interested, right now, on the minimum hardware requirements to run it. I'm not going to invest on a new Windows machine for a long time, and I want to know if the hardware I have now will be enough to run it!
im exited for all the new easter eggs which have been semi confirmed, but also just seem very likely
I'm excited to participate in the EA process - looking forward to watching as the performance improves, bugs are fixed, and new features are rolled out!
Looking forward to new visuals, new techs and new stellar systems down the line.
Oh man i want to see if it's really optimized or not
Im really excited to play KSP2 multiplayer with my friend
Im excited for orbital construction, offworld colonies and most importantly: the now very experienced modding community! :-D
I'm excited for the revamped terrain! I love exploration and can't wait for there to be a higher degree of it in KSP2!
